text: Szymanowice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Krotoszyce, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north-east of Krotoszyce, south-west of Legnica's centre, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Szymanowice
title: Szymanowice, Legnica County
